text:
The song fills my soul, but unfortunately I can't say the same for the video. It was a very simple clip. However, I wanted to watch the events take place between every street, in the windows of shops, on the sidewalks, on the balconies and windows. I wanted to watch them from their childhood until the day they started to be lovers. I would have liked to watch everything with the hero of the story until the day they lost each other... If only we could see that everywhere he walked and turned his eyes and looked, he would encounter his memories and see that he was suffering from it.  

Şarkı ruhumu doyuruyor fakat klip için aynı şeyi söyleyemiyorum malesef. Çok sade bir klip olmuş. Oysaki yaşanmışlıkları izlemek isterdim her bir sokak arasında, dükkanların camlarında, kaldırımlarda, balkonlarda ve pencerelerde. Çocukluklarından başlayıp sevgili olmaya başladıkları güne kadar izlemek isterdim onları. Birbirlerini kaybettikleri güne dek hikayenin kahramanıyla birlikte izlemek isterdim tüm her şeyi... Yürüdüğü ve gözünü çevirip baktığı her yerde anılarıyla karşılaşsa ve bundan acı çektiğini görebilseydik keşke.

text:
This song was released when the guy I was in talking stage with started becoming distant to me, when I was suspicious of him. I already liked this song but the day he confessed that he liked another girl, this song hit differently! I could relate with every single word of this song. It's sick how music can make you feel the same way you felt in that particular moment all over again. It still makes me feel the way it did back then, smth that I don't feel the other times, all the memories come back to me and it feels like I am going through it right now. This song exactly describe how I felt. And I definitely made it "easier for him to leave me" and "loved him either way"
.
P.S. am completely over him now, thanks to my "bestfriend" who is in love w me the way I am in with him ;)

text: After almost 7 years, my gf chose to break up (for now), love is still there, it was a hard choice, it’s so much pain to imagine a world where I don’t get old with her, but our relationship would have been partly a lie if she did not listen to what she was feeling for her good and our good. We only live once, and I just made it easier for her, I understood and I only want her to be happy even though it was hard to say goodbye maybe forever. We could not imagine leaving each other so quickly not knowing that we will get together after all. Life guides us all, let’s see then… Guys don’t take what you have for granted, enjoy what you have, one day, prepared or not, you can loose it and it won’t necessarily be on you. Take care.

text:
This man is a typical play boy. He played with her heart, then wrote this to his advantage. Even if she wanted to breakup first, there were reasons for her to say so, however 
He says in the song "we dont have to fix it.. 
we dont have to stay" it shows he didnt care about her feelings or that she was hurt or wanted him to be loyal to her. Its not always that a girl says she is leaving and means it. We often say it so we are stopped. Thats all we want. Woman wants to feel needed, he didnt need her. 
He was passively aggressive in the relationship ever worse - he just didnt care.
author: Marimba

text: The pain of break up sometimes hit harder on younger people than us the older ones but the feelings are the same. We all wish for a love that is everlasting but in reality, nothing lasts forever. We just need to leave good memories and impressions that last in the heart of the person for as long as the person is alive.  We all strive to be better people despite our circumstances, I hope and wish anyone hurting the very best and may they find the courage to someday love again, Warm hugs from me to you and everyone hurting. Janice
author: Janice Mohamed
